description:
Connect your BaseCharge power station any solar panel equipped with an MC4 connector. This cord allows you to connect MC4 plugs to High Power Pole (HPP)ports.

  • High Power Pole (HPP) male port on one end and MC4 positive and negative ports on the other
  • Gauge: 16AWG – on the 2, into 12AWG – on the single
  • Length: 38cm (15")
name: BioLite Solar to MC4 Adapter Cable
